Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: Talking Books, journals and magazines, language course materials, CDs, fax service, DVDs, meeting room for hire, A3 and A4 photocopier, community language material available in Albanian, Arabic, Polish and Urdu. Children's activities include Baby Time and Chatterbooks reading group. Provides 10 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office (including a template for a CV), internet access, a scanner and colour printer, available for public use. Please contact library for latest events and activities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7pm, Tues & Wed 9.30am-7pm, Thurs closed, Fri 9.30am-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-4pm (opening times); 1st Mon in the month 10-11am (Babytime for 0-3s), Mon 1-4pm (Next Step, advice on learning and work including CVs), 1st Tues in the month 3.30-5pm (Chatterbooks for 8-12s), last Tues in the month 9.30-11.30am (Age Concern drop-in), Fri 9.30am-12.30pm (coffee morning)
